_sText:
From the Maps Text file:

Another Release from Mapper B-Phoenix

This map is based in an underground military weapons testing complex and has several secret spots

its a large map with a trigger which can be used to kill all people and destroy barricades to those who are not in the Safe areas

The way to activate the "Neutron Wave" is by doing the following:


Firstly Get into the reactor and destroy the core
Then Press the First button you see near a shield like area but not the 1 with the signs around it
then after the power up has happend press the secondary button which is the firing button
and enjoy the show

Also i'd like to note that there are 2 ways of making the neutron wave unable to fire

the first is the ball like object at the bottom of the complex underground the second is a button which will only work if the device hasnt been activated, but this button is hidden in 1 of the secrets so happy hunting

Contact information:

if any problems with the map or if you have any questions feel free to pop me an email at
jimbo128@live.co.uk and i will try to get back to you 
or you can contact me on FPSB my user is B-Phoenix

enjoy!

*************************************************

Ok so as the text file says this is another release from me, this time all my own work, the doors are original, i know that  few people got annoyed in the last release about this so i fixed it to so that its all mine

This map is a large map designed for 64 players

There are plenty of places to barricade, hide and even camp or climb you just need to find them, there is an outside now its no longer underwater unlike v4_2 some spots have been removed that was in v4_2 which had been requested by emails i had from people who play the old version but this version is up to date and got a new area as well as a lot of the older 1s

anyways enjoy if u have any ideas for a future release feel free to look me up my contact details are in the text provided
